description: This file defines the RecipeGrid widget, a stateless Flutter widget that renders a responsive grid layout of RecipeCard widgets using SliverGrid. It adjusts the number of columns and aspect ratio based on screen width and handles tap events for each recipe card.

classes.name: RecipeGrid
classes.description: A widget that displays a grid of RecipeCard widgets, arranged responsively based on screen size, with optional tap handling.

methods.name: RecipeGrid
methods.description: Constructor for RecipeGrid widget, requiring a list of recipes and optional tap handler and max tags.

methods.name: _crossAxisCountForWidth
methods.description: Determines the number of columns based on the available width.

methods.name: _childAspectRatioForWidth
methods.description: Determines the aspect ratio of each grid item based on width.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the SliverGrid layout based on current constraints.
